subNodes.conversationText: root
Your father, Adwen, made it back safely and is working on preparing Charnia's defenses.|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::storm_fortress    String::30    |
It appears that you were able to withstand the witch's initial attack.
Yes, we were very well prepared and not many Charnians were lost in the battle.
Did you go after the witch as your father discussed?
Not yet.
There is no time to waste.  Please, travel to the volcano lands and see what you can learn about the witch's plans.
We shall return shortly.
Farewell and good luck.
Hello <FirstName>, I am Jerun, and your father is a close friend of mine.|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::fathers_caravan    String::30    |
I am sure you are anxious to begin the rescue plans.
We have gathered much information about Zorn's Fortress and your father's location.
It will be very difficult to get in and out alive, but with your arrival, there may be a chance.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::700    Int::1    |
Great, what have you learned and what are our options?
Zorn and his mistress, a powerful and beautiful witch, have a very large army.
I believe the only chance we have is two fold.  First, we create a diversion to draw some of his troops out so that you can sneak into the fortress and find Adwen and the others.
In the mean time, we should send for help from our friends on the other side of the Grimstan Mountains.
If you feel that this is our best chance then we will do what is necessary.
Great, I think if we can draw some of Zorn's troops out of his fortress with a diversion then you should be able to sneak into the prisons and rescue your father and the others.
First, if you can take care of the Zornians here in Charnia, including the leader in the tower, Suril and I will gather together our people and the Charnians in hiding.
We then will reinforce the town and prepare for Zorn's troops to arrive once they discover that we have taken back Charnia.
Once Zorn's troops have left their fortress, you and your friends can slip into the prisons and free your father.
We should be able to hold off Zorn's army as I am sure he will under estimate the size of our forces and send a small army.
I think this sounds like a good idea.  We'll take care of the Zornians here in town.
Perfect!  Report back here once you have removed the foul creatures and their leader from the tower.
Good luck to all.
May Elos be with you and us.
I think this plan is too risky.  We should just wait for help to arrive.
You may not have another chance to free your father and our friends.  Plus, you may learn some valueable information about our enemies' plans.
Alright, we'll go along with the plan.
Great, I think if we can draw some of Zorn's troops out of his fortress with a diversion then you should be able to sneak into the prisons and rescue your father and the others.
Hello, I am Jerun, the acting leader of the people here in Charnia.
Acting?  Who is the normal leader?
Adwen, but he was taken from us a number of months ago to Zorn's prison.
Adwen is my father.  We came from the Western Lands in search of him and his companions.
Your father and I are close friends, I am sorry he was not here to meet you.
I am sure you are anxious to begin the rescue plans.
We have gathered much information about Zorn's Fortress and your father's location.
It will be very difficult to get in and out alive, but with your arrival, there may be a chance.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::700    Int::1    |

Zorn and his mistress, a powerful and beautiful witch, have a very large army.
I believe the only chance we have is two fold.  First, we create a diversion to draw some of his troops out so that you can sneak into the fortress and find Adwen and the others.
In the mean time, we should send for help from our friends on the other side of the Grimstan Mountains.
If you feel that this is our best chance then we will do what is necessary.

Alright, we'll go along with the plan.
Great, I think if we can draw some of Zorn's troops out of his fortress with a diversion then you should be able to sneak into the prisons and rescue your father and the others.
Were you able to find your father?|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::storm_fortress    String::20    |
Not yet, we're still working on it.

Were you able to defeat the Zornian leader in the tower?|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::zornian_leader    String::20    ***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::storm_fortress    String::10    |
Yes, we took care of them.
Perfect!  Everything is going as planned.|***sj_a_map_point_show-->String::mp_falls    ***sj_a_map_point_show-->String::mp_forest    |
Now we can start the reinforcements of the town.  It may take a few days for Zorn to realize what is happening and send troops.|***ga_give_xp-->Int::1000    Int::1    |
Now is your chance to sneak into Zorn's castle and free your father.
You may still encounter some resistance, but I am sure you will be successful.
I'll make the path on your map.
Take care and return with you father as soon as possible.
We shall return quickly.  Take care.
Any progress with defeating the Zornians in Charnia?|***gc_journal_entry-->NOT::False    String::storm_fortress    String::10    |
Not yet, we're still working on it.
